translations: v.打滚；沉湎；颠簸；休闲浸泡（wallow 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Never have I had such a good excuse for wallowing in deep warm baths.
sentences.translation: 我从不曾有过这样一个好理由，可以好好地享受个热水澡。

sentences.sentence: It also ensures that you won't sit at home every night wallowing in self-pity.
sentences.translation: 同时也要保证你不会每天晚上独自一人在家里自我哀悼。

sentences.sentence: "If so, wallowing could be an important element of a good life in pigs," said Dr Bracke.
sentences.translation: “如果是这样的话，在水里打滚可能是猪美好生活的重要部分。”马克博士说。
